number_of_tokens.name: Node with number of tokens
number_of_tokens.description: Checks if a node with a particular number of tokens exists.

possible_sequence.name: Is firing sequence possible
possible_sequence.description: Checks if a specific sequence of firing transitions is possible.

params.name: list of transition labels in order of firing

impossible_sequence.name: Is firing sequence impossible
impossible_sequence.description: Checks if a specific sequence of firing transitions is impossible.

params.name: list of transition labels in order of firing

marking_given.name: Marking is given
marking_given.description: Checks if a particular marking is given for a known petri-net. Given a petri-net checks if the markings in the student answer are the same.

workflow_net.name: Is workflow net
workflow_net.description: Checks if a petri-net is workflow net (there is a unique initial and final state and every node is between the initial and final state).
